item.title: Weapon Speacils
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“i0wnuall, post:4, topic:123507”][quote author=i_own_pking link=topic=173278.msg1598600#msg1598600 date=1184528611]

Hey can i have a good tut on Weapon Speacils? Thanks alot =)

i coded my own… the ones like palidins such to be honest… they dont even have double dds hits…

ive got full specials including dds, maul, bow, hally and stuff that double hit
[/quote]

well are you here to rub it in my face or to help me?[/quote]

im just saying its not hard to make your own… the hardest bit is doing a dds boolean and such to double hit but coding normal specials with 1 hit bigger or such is easy[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 09:04:10 AM[/size][hr][quote=“i0wnuall, post:1, topic:123507”]Hey can i have a good tut on Weapon Speacils? Thanks alot =)[/quote]

speacils? what are they… sorry i thought you ment special as in special attacks

Read full topic
